faqs.question: What is Okal Super Saver?
faqs.answer: Okal Super Saver is a membership program offering extra discounts, free deliveries, and exclusive deals on grocery orders.

faqs.question: How can I subscribe to Okal Super Saver?
faqs.answer: You can subscribe through the 'Okal Super Saver' section in the app by choosing a plan and completing payment.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of Okal Super Saver?
faqs.answer: Super Saver members enjoy exclusive coupons, free delivery on eligible orders, early access to sales, and up to 20% extra discounts.

faqs.question: Is there a free trial for Okal Super Saver?
faqs.answer: Okal occasionally offers trial memberships. Check the app for any ongoing Super Saver trial offers.

faqs.question: How long does the Okal Super Saver membership last?
faqs.answer: Membership validity depends on the plan you choose—typically monthly, quarterly, or yearly.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my Okal Super Saver subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime under 'My Account' > 'Memberships'. However, refunds are not provided for partial periods.

faqs.question: Will my Okal Super Saver renew automatically?
faqs.answer: Yes, Super Saver renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal before the renewal date.

faqs.question: Can I share my Okal Super Saver benefits with friends or family?
faqs.answer: No, membership benefits are linked to one account and cannot be shared.

faqs.question: Does Okal Super Saver apply on all products?
faqs.answer: Most items are covered under Super Saver, but certain categories or brands may be excluded during special promotions.

faqs.question: How can I check my Okal Super Saver membership status?
faqs.answer: Go to 'My Account' > 'Memberships' to view your plan details, expiry date, and renewal options.

faqs.question: Will I get notified before my Super Saver plan expires?
faqs.answer: Yes, you’ll receive reminders before your membership expiry or renewal date.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my Super Saver plan?
faqs.answer: Currently, plan changes are not supported mid-cycle. You can switch plans at renewal.

faqs.question: Are Super Saver discounts visible automatically during checkout?
faqs.answer: Yes, eligible discounts and free delivery benefits are auto-applied for Super Saver members at checkout.

faqs.question: Can I combine Super Saver discounts with coupons or wallet offers?
faqs.answer: In most cases, Super Saver benefits can be combined with coupons or wallet offers unless restricted by a specific promotion.

faqs.question: Does Super Saver cover express or priority deliveries?
faqs.answer: Yes, Super Saver members get priority delivery and may receive additional discounts on express orders.

faqs.question: Will I lose Super Saver benefits if my payment fails during renewal?
faqs.answer: Yes, benefits pause if renewal payment fails. Once payment is successful, benefits are reinstated instantly.

faqs.question: Is Okal Super Saver available in all cities?
faqs.answer: Super Saver is being rolled out city by city. Check availability in the app for your location.

faqs.question: Do I earn loyalty points as a Super Saver member?
faqs.answer: Yes, Super Saver members earn additional loyalty points and exclusive cashback on eligible purchases.

faqs.question: Can I get a refund if I don’t use my Super Saver benefits?
faqs.answer: No, Super Saver fees are non-refundable once the membership is activated.

faqs.question: How can I contact support for Super Saver issues?
faqs.answer: You can reach out via in-app chat or email support@okal.in for any Super Saver-related queries.
